job.title: Software Engineer

youppbrppstrongCompensation StructurestrongpulliBase Salary 1070000014500000 commensurate with experience  Signing BonusliliBenefits 401k match transinclusive health benefits 12weeks paid maternitypaternityadoptionfostering leave unlimited PTO and moreliulpbrppQuorum Is Working to Advance Pay Equity What Does That Mean For YouppIn an effort to continue to build a diverse and inclusive work environment that advances pay equity Quorum has implemented a No Negotiation policy for base salary for new hires for roles that are currently staffed by three or more team members This means that candidates for the Software Engineer role cannot negotiate Quorums base salary offerppbrppHeres our promise to youpulliWe will not ask you what you are currently earningliliWe will consider years of relevant experience relevant professional certificationseducation and performance expectations in setting what we believe is a competitive fair base salary offerliliWe will be transparent about our resources Project Include AAUW Ministry for Women MagooshppNote Quorum does not endorse or verify any of the information provided in the resources on the impact of negotiation on pay equity We provide
